content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment. I'll start with a price of 1000 Euros. Remember, I only want to discuss the rental price and nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for starting the negotiation, Mr. Schmidt. I am open to discussing the price. How about we start with 800 Euros?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'll meet you halfway. Let's say 900 Euros. Just remember, we are only discussing the rental price and nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the counteroffer, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about 850 Euros? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'll accept your proposal of 850 Euros. Please remember that we are only discussing the rental price and nothing else. Here's the agreement: 'I agree to the price of [850] Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
